name: Poison Prisoner Pursuit
description:
What Is This Game?

Poison Platty needs to poison the prisoners who are trying to escape. BUT! Whenever he spits his poison he could break stuff like towers that are used to keep the prisoners from escaping. It has keyboard and controller support.

CONTROLS

- Move : Arrow keys on Keyboard. Dpad or Left Stick on Controller

- Spit Poison: Spacebar on Keyboard, A button on Controller

- Restart: F on Keyboard. B button on Controller

- Main Menu: Esc key on Keyboard
